logistics.name: Logistics
logistics.description: Increases the speed of your land units by 10%.

architecture.name: Architecture
architecture.description: Reduces the construction time of buildings by 10%.

irrigation.name: Irrigation
irrigation.description: Increases the population capacity from Farms by 10%.

archery.name: Archery
archery.description: Unlocks the ability to train Archers in the Barracks.

espionage.name: Espionage
espionage.description: Allows you to train Spies in your Cave to gather intelligence on your enemies.

phalanx.name: Phalanx
phalanx.description: Unlocks the ability to train Hoplites, heavily armored defensive infantry.

shipwright.name: Shipwright
shipwright.description: Unlocks the ability to build basic Transport Ships in the Shipyard.

horsemanship.name: Horsemanship
horsemanship.description: Unlocks the ability to train Cavalry, fast and powerful mounted units.

naval_warfare.name: Naval Warfare
naval_warfare.description: Unlocks the ability to build your nation's primary warship (e.g., Trireme).

ballistics.name: Ballistics
ballistics.description: Increases the attack power of archers and slingers by 15%.

coinage.name: Coinage
coinage.description: Increases silver production from your Silver Mine by 15%.

advanced_shipwright.name: Advanced Shipwright
advanced_shipwright.description: Unlocks the ability to build Fast Transport Ships.

forged_weapons.name: Forged Weapons
forged_weapons.description: Improves the attack of all melee land units by 10%.

fortification.name: Fortification
fortification.description: Increases the defensive bonus of your City Wall by 20%.

cartography.name: Cartography
cartography.description: Your merchants travel 20% faster between cities.

boarding.name: Boarding
boarding.description: Your warships are more effective in naval combat, increasing their attack by 10%.

theology.name: Theology
theology.description: Deepens your understanding of the divine, increasing favor production by 10%.

counter_espionage.name: Counter-Espionage
counter_espionage.description: Increases the chance to detect and eliminate enemy spies in your city.

plate_armor.name: Plate Armor
plate_armor.description: Improves the defense of all melee land units by 10%.

medicine.name: Medicine
medicine.description: Increases the capacity of your Hospital by 20% and speeds up healing.

conscription.name: Conscription
conscription.description: Reduces the training time of all land units by 10%.

divine_mandate.name: Divine Mandate
divine_mandate.description: The gods look more favorably upon you. Reduces the favor cost of all divine powers by 15%.
